post.post_title: Journey to destination from the comfort of your home
post.post_content:
If you're planning a trip but don't want to deal with the hassle of travelling, there's good news! You can now journey to your destination from the comfort of your home.

With virtual reality technology, you can immerse yourself in another world and explore it at your own pace. You can visit different places and even go back in time to experience history firsthand.

Whether you're looking to travel to a far-off land or simply want to explore your own city in a new way, virtual reality can take you there. So what are you waiting for? Grab your VR headset and start your journey today!

post.post_title: Interesting phrases from around the world
post.post_content:
Do you know what a "Wanderlust" is? In German, it means "love of traveling", but in English, it has come to mean a strong, irresistible desire to travel. If you're feeling a bit wanderlust-y, why not explore some of the other interesting phrases from around the world?

In France, there's the phrase "joie de vivre", which means "joy of living". This is a perfect way to describe the French attitude towards life – enjoying every moment to the fullest.

If you're ever in Italy and someone calls you a "Dolce Vita", they're not calling you a sweet life, but rather a good life. This phrase is often used to describe the Italian lifestyle, which is all about good food, good wine and good company.

In Spain, there's the phrase "No hay mal que por bien no venga", which means "There's no such thing as a bad thing that doesn't come with a good thing". This is a great way to look at the glass half full – even the bad things in life can have a silver lining.

Do you have a favorite phrase from another language? Share it in the comments below!

I started traveling when I was very young. My first trip was to Disney World with my family. I have also been to Europe and Asia. I love to travel because I get to see new places and meet new people. Traveling has also helped me to learn about different cultures. I have met people from all over the world and it has been a great experience. I would encourage everyone to travel, it is an amazing experience.

page.post_content:
INLINE STYLE 3

Our suites are the perfect place to stay for a relaxing and comfortable getaway.

INLINE STYLE 3

Our suites are the perfect place to stay for a relaxing and comfortable getaway.

Previous Next Updated

Ambassador Suite

The Ambassador Suite is a large and luxurious suite typically found in top-tier hotels. It often features a separate bedroom and living area, as well as a private bathroom. Some suites also include a kitchenette or dining area.

  • Wifi
  • Breakfast
  • Room Service
  • Ensuite
Check Availability $399 /night Previous Next Large

Royal Suite

The Royal Suite is the most luxurious suite at a hotel. It features a bedroom, a living room, a dining area, and a private bathroom. It is often decorated with luxurious furnishings and features state-of-the-art amenities.

  • Wifi
  • Breakfast
  • Room Service
  • Ensuite
Check Availability $299 /night Previous Next Updated

Garden Suite

Aa luxurious and spacious accommodation option for hotel guests. This suite is designed with a garden theme, and features a private patio with outdoor seating. The suite also includes a king-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed, a dining area, and a fully equipped kitchen.

  • Wifi
  • Breakfast
  • Room Service
  • Ensuite
Check Availability $369 /night Previous Next Large

Imperial Suite

The Imperial Suite is the most luxurious suite in the hotel. It features a king-sized bed, a sitting area, and a private bathroom. The suite also has a balcony with a view of the city.

  • Wifi
  • Breakfast
  • Room Service
  • Ensuite
Check Availability $299 /night Previous Next Updated

Executive Suite

A spacious and luxurious room designed for business travelers or those seeking a more upscale experience. The suite includes a bedroom with a king-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed, a dining area, and a private balcony.

  • Wifi
  • Breakfast
  • Room Service
  • Ensuite
Check Availability $499 /night Previous Next Large

Presidential Suite

The Presidential Suite is the most luxurious and expensive suite at a hotel. It typically features a separate bedroom, living room, and dining area, as well as a kitchenette and multiple bathrooms.

  • Wifi
  • Breakfast
  • Room Service
  • Ensuite

Ambassador Suite

The Ambassador Suite is a large and luxurious suite typically found in top-tier hotels. It often features a separate bedroom and living area, as well as a private bathroom. Some suites also include a kitchenette or dining area.

Royal Suite

The Royal Suite is the most luxurious suite at a hotel. It features a bedroom, a living room, a dining area, and a private bathroom. It is often decorated with luxurious furnishings and features state-of-the-art amenities.

page.post_content:
STANDARD FULL

Our suites are the perfect place to stay for a relaxing and comfortable getaway. Each suite includes a bedroom, living room, and kitchenette.

Previous Next Updated $399 /night

Ambassador Suite

Private bathroom

The Ambassador Suite is a large and luxurious suite typically found in top-tier hotels. It often features a separate bedroom and living area, as well as a private bathroom. Some suites also include a kitchenette or dining area.

Check Availability Previous Next Large $299 /night

Royal Suite

State-of-the-art amenities

page.post_content:
STANDARD STYLE 1

Our suites are the perfect place to stay for a relaxing and comfortable getaway. Each suite includes a bedroom, living room, and kitchenette.

Previous Next Updated $399 /night
  • 5 min walk to city

Ambassador Suite

The Ambassador Suite is a large and luxurious suite typically found in top-tier hotels. It often features a separate bedroom and living area, as well as a private bathroom. Some suites also include a kitchenette or dining area.

  • Wifi
  • Breakfast
  • Room Service
  • Ensuite
Check Availability Previous Next Large $299 /night
  • 5 min walk to city

Royal Suite

The Royal Suite is the most luxurious suite at a hotel. It features a bedroom, a living room, a dining area, and a private bathroom. It is often decorated with luxurious furnishings and features state-of-the-art amenities.

  • Wifi
  • Breakfast
  • Room Service
  • Ensuite
Check Availability Previous Next Updated $369 /night
  • 5 min walk to city

Garden Suite

Aa luxurious and spacious accommodation option for hotel guests. This suite is designed with a garden theme, and features a private patio with outdoor seating. The suite also includes a king-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed, a dining area, and a fully equipped kitchen.

  • Wifi
  • Breakfast
  • Room Service
  • Ensuite
Check Availability Previous Next Large $299 /night
  • 5 min walk to city

Imperial Suite

The Imperial Suite is the most luxurious suite in the hotel. It features a king-sized bed, a sitting area, and a private bathroom. The suite also has a balcony with a view of the city.

  • Wifi
  • Breakfast
  • Room Service
  • Ensuite
Check Availability Previous Next Updated $499 /night
  • 5 min walk to city

Executive Suite

A spacious and luxurious room designed for business travelers or those seeking a more upscale experience. The suite includes a bedroom with a king-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed, a dining area, and a private balcony.

  • Wifi
  • Breakfast
  • Room Service
  • Ensuite
Check Availability Previous Next Large $499 /night
  • 5 min walk to city

Presidential Suite

The Presidential Suite is the most luxurious and expensive suite at a hotel. It typically features a separate bedroom, living room, and dining area, as well as a kitchenette and multiple bathrooms.

  • Wifi
  • Breakfast
  • Room Service
  • Ensuite
Check Availability

page.post_content:
Home - Payment Success

PAYMENT SUCCESS

Thank you for your payment. Your transaction has been completed and a receipt for your purchase has been emailed to you. We look forward to seeing you soon.

page.post_content:
The most luxurious hotel in town.

Our luxurious accommodations and impeccable service are sure to make your stay unforgettable. Our elegant hotel features spacious rooms with elegant décor, and all the amenities you need to feel at home. We look forward to welcoming you soon!

Book your stay

Elegant décor

Whether you are staying for business or pleasure, our hotel provides an oasis from the everyday. From the moment you walk in the door, you will feel pampered.

Impeccable service

Our restaurants offer cuisine of the highest standard: Russian, European, barbecue menus and culinary delights with a touch of exotic from our chef.

Rejuvenating spa

The hotel spa is a luxurious place to relax and rejuvenate. The spa offers a variety of services such as massages, facials, and body treatments.

Event venues

The hotel event venue is the perfect place to host your next event. With a variety of spaces to choose from, we can accommodate events of all sizes.

OUR HOTEL

Our elegant hotel features spacious rooms with elegant décor, and all the amenities you need to feel at home. Enjoy a delicious meal in our elegant restaurant, or relax in our luxurious spa. Our hotel is the perfect choice for business or leisure travelers alike. We look forward to welcoming you soon!

Read More Previous Next

An unforgettable stay!

Watch the video

Book your stay at our hotel and enjoy a comfortable and relaxing experience. Our hotel offers excellent accommodations and services, perfect for business and leisure travelers alike. Our convenient location allows easy access to all the best the city has to offer. Book now and take advantage of our special deals and discounts.

Hotel staff are typically knowledgeable about the area and can provide recommendations for things to do and see. Additionally, many hotels offer loyalty programs which provide discounts and other benefits.

ROOMS & SUITES


Our suites are the perfect place to stay for a relaxing and comfortable getaway. Each suite includes a bedroom, living room, and kitchenette, as well as a private balcony or patio. You'll have plenty of space to spread out and enjoy your stay. Plus, our suites come equipped with all the amenities

Previous Next $399 /night Private bathroom

Ambassador Suite

The Ambassador Suite is a large and luxurious suite typically found in top-tier hotels. It often features a separate bedroom and living area, as well as a private bathroom. Some suites also include a kitchenette or dining area.

Check Availability Previous Next $299 /night State-of-the-art amenities

Royal Suite

The Royal Suite is the most luxurious suite at a hotel. It features a bedroom, a living room, a dining area, and a private bathroom. It is often decorated with luxurious furnishings and features state-of-the-art amenities.

Check Availability Previous Next $499 /night Separate bedroom, living room

Presidential Suite

The Presidential Suite is the most luxurious and expensive suite at a hotel. It typically features a separate bedroom, living room, and dining area, as well as a kitchenette and multiple bathrooms.

Check Availability

COVID-19 Precautions

We would like to advise our guests that we are closely monitoring the COVID-19 situation and will take all necessary precautions to protect our guests and staff.

Basic Hotel Etiquette

There are some rules that guests should follow in order to make their stay more pleasant for everyone. Guests should be aware of the following.

Romance Package

This package is designed for couples who want to enjoy a romantic weekend getaway at a hotel.

AT YOUR SERVICE

The staff is friendly and knowledgeable and can help you choose the right service. Our hotel offers excellent accommodations and services, perfect for business and leisure travelers alike. Our convenient location allows easy access to all the best the city has to offer. Book now and take advantage of our special deals and discounts.

What's nearby?

There are plenty of things to do near the hotel. Depending on your location, guests might be able to visit local tourist attractions, go shopping, or go out for dinner and drinks.

Sightseeing

Visit the Statue of Liberty, Ride the Staten Island Ferry.

Dinning out

There are endless options for dining out in NYC.

Wildlife attraction

A wildlife attraction is a great place to learn about and see animals in their natural habitats. They can be educational and fun for the whole family.

Casino

They offer a variety of games and opportunities to win money, while also providing a fun and festive atmosphere.

Review

We use a third-party review aggregator, TripAdvisor, to collect and display hotel reviews.

page.post_content:
EXPLORE

  • 5.0
  • 10 km away

Romantic Getaway Package

The Romantic Getaway Package is a perfect way to celebrate a special occasion or simply reconnect with your loved one. The package includes a one-night stay in a luxurious suite, a bottle of champagne, breakfast in bed, and a romantic dinner for two. This package is the perfect way to escape for a weekend and enjoy some quality time together.

From  From $299 Learn More
  • 5.0
  • 10 km away

Girls' Night Out Package

The Girls' Night Out Package for a Hotel is a great way for a group of women to have a fun night out. The package includes a room for the group, a bottle of champagne, and a $100 credit for the hotel's spa. The group can use the credit to enjoy a relaxing massage or a pedicure. The package also includes a breakfast buffet for the group in the morning. This is a great way for the group to relax and catch up with each other.

From  From $299 Learn More
  • 5.0
  • 10 km away

Spa Package

Includes a one night stay in a luxurious room, a $100 credit towards spa services, and a bottle of champagne.

From  From $299 Learn More
  • 5.0
  • 10 km away

Adventure Package

Includes a one night stay in a luxurious room, a $100 credit towards activities such as skiing, rafting, and golfing, and a bottle of champagne.

From  From $299 Learn More

WHAT TO DO

Welcome to the Perfect Holiday section of our website! Here, you will find everything you need to make your stay perfect. We also offer a variety of activities and services to make your holiday unforgettable.

Play games

Spend a day exploring a theme park with thrilling roller coasters, exciting shows, and entertaining attractions.

Do Yoga

Students will flow through a sequence of poses that will open the hips, hamstrings, and shoulders.

Relax

Includes a one night stay in a luxurious room, a $100 credit towards spa services.

Hit the beach

Relax on the beach with a good book, listen to the waves, and enjoy the sun.

See a show

Watch a Broadway show, catch a concert, or see a play while in town.

Tour a city

Take in the sights and sounds of a new city by touring the main attractions and neighborhoods.

Go camping

Escape to nature by camping in a beautiful location and enjoying the great outdoors.

Mindfulness

Learn new skills or indulge in your passions while on vacation.

page.post_content:
Explore

Take in the sights and sounds of a new city by touring the main attractions and neighborhoods.

Home / Explore
  • 5.0
  • 10 km away

Romantic Getaway Package

The Romantic Getaway Package is a perfect way to celebrate a special occasion or simply reconnect with your loved one. The package includes a one-night stay in a luxurious suite, a bottle of champagne, breakfast in bed, and a romantic dinner for two. This package is the perfect way to escape for a weekend and enjoy some quality time together.

From  From $299 Learn More
  • 5.0
  • 10 km away

Girls' Night Out Package

The Girls' Night Out Package for a Hotel is a great way for a group of women to have a fun night out. The package includes a room for the group, a bottle of champagne, and a $100 credit for the hotel's spa. The group can use the credit to enjoy a relaxing massage or a pedicure. The package also includes a breakfast buffet for the group in the morning. This is a great way for the group to relax and catch up with each other.

From  From $299 Learn More
  • 5.0
  • 10 km away

Spa Package

Includes a one night stay in a luxurious room, a $100 credit towards spa services, and a bottle of champagne.

From  From $299 Learn More
  • 5.0
  • 10 km away

Adventure Package

Includes a one night stay in a luxurious room, a $100 credit towards activities such as skiing, rafting, and golfing, and a bottle of champagne.

From  From $299 Learn More

WHAT TO DO

Welcome to the Perfect Holiday section of our website! Here, you will find everything you need to make your stay perfect. We also offer a variety of activities and services to make your holiday unforgettable.

Play games

Spend a day exploring a theme park with thrilling roller coasters, exciting shows, and entertaining attractions.

Do Yoga

Students will flow through a sequence of poses that will open the hips, hamstrings, and shoulders.

Relax

Includes a one night stay in a luxurious room, a $100 credit towards spa services.

Hit the beach

Relax on the beach with a good book, listen to the waves, and enjoy the sun.

See a show

Watch a Broadway show, catch a concert, or see a play while in town.

Tour a city

Take in the sights and sounds of a new city by touring the main attractions and neighborhoods.

Go camping

Escape to nature by camping in a beautiful location and enjoying the great outdoors.

Mindfulness

Learn new skills or indulge in your passions while on vacation.

page.post_content:
INLINE STYLE 1

Our suites are the perfect place to stay for a relaxing and comfortable getaway.

INLINE STYLE 1

Our suites are the perfect place to stay for a relaxing and comfortable getaway.

Previous Next $399 /night Updated

Ambassador Suite

Private bathroom

The Ambassador Suite is a large and luxurious suite typically found in top-tier hotels. It often features a separate bedroom and living area, as well as a private bathroom. Some suites also include a kitchenette or dining area.

Check Availability
Previous Next $299 /night Large

Royal Suite

State-of-the-art amenities

The Royal Suite is the most luxurious suite at a hotel. It features a bedroom, a living room, a dining area, and a private bathroom. It is often decorated with luxurious furnishings and features state-of-the-art amenities.

Check Availability
Previous Next $369 /night Updated

Garden Suite

Features a private patio with outdoor seating.

Aa luxurious and spacious accommodation option for hotel guests. This suite is designed with a garden theme, and features a private patio with outdoor seating. The suite also includes a king-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed, a dining area, and a fully equipped kitchen.

Check Availability
Previous Next $299 /night Large

Imperial Suite

King-sized bed and a private bathroom

The Imperial Suite is the most luxurious suite in the hotel. It features a king-sized bed, a sitting area, and a private bathroom. The suite also has a balcony with a view of the city.

Check Availability
Previous Next $499 /night Updated

Executive Suite

King-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed

A spacious and luxurious room designed for business travelers or those seeking a more upscale experience. The suite includes a bedroom with a king-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed, a dining area, and a private balcony.

Check Availability
Previous Next $499 /night Large

Presidential Suite

Separate bedroom, living room

The Presidential Suite is the most luxurious and expensive suite at a hotel. It typically features a separate bedroom, living room, and dining area, as well as a kitchenette and multiple bathrooms.

Check Availability

CHECK AVAILABILITY

page.post_content:
2 Column

Our suites are the perfect place to stay for a relaxing and comfortable getaway.

STANDARD STYLE 2 ALTERNATIVE

Our suites are the perfect place to stay for a relaxing and comfortable getaway.

Previous Next Updated $399 /night Private bathroom

Ambassador Suite

The Ambassador Suite is a large and luxurious suite typically found in top-tier hotels. It often features a separate bedroom and living area, as well as a private bathroom. Some suites also include a kitchenette or dining area.

Check Availability Previous Next Large $299 /night State-of-the-art amenities

Royal Suite

The Royal Suite is the most luxurious suite at a hotel. It features a bedroom, a living room, a dining area, and a private bathroom. It is often decorated with luxurious furnishings and features state-of-the-art amenities.

Check Availability Previous Next Updated $369 /night Features a private patio with outdoor seating.

Garden Suite

Aa luxurious and spacious accommodation option for hotel guests. This suite is designed with a garden theme, and features a private patio with outdoor seating. The suite also includes a king-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed, a dining area, and a fully equipped kitchen.

Check Availability Previous Next Large $299 /night King-sized bed and a private bathroom

Imperial Suite

The Imperial Suite is the most luxurious suite in the hotel. It features a king-sized bed, a sitting area, and a private bathroom. The suite also has a balcony with a view of the city.

Check Availability Previous Next Updated $499 /night King-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed

Executive Suite

A spacious and luxurious room designed for business travelers or those seeking a more upscale experience. The suite includes a bedroom with a king-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed, a dining area, and a private balcony.

Check Availability Previous Next Large $499 /night Separate bedroom, living room

Presidential Suite

The Presidential Suite is the most luxurious and expensive suite at a hotel. It typically features a separate bedroom, living room, and dining area, as well as a kitchenette and multiple bathrooms.

Check Availability

CHECK AVAILABILITY

page.post_content:
STANDARD STYLE 2

Our suites are the perfect place to stay for a relaxing and comfortable getaway. Each suite includes a bedroom, living room, and kitchenette.

Previous Next Updated $399 /night Private bathroom

Ambassador Suite

The Ambassador Suite is a large and luxurious suite typically found in top-tier hotels. It often features a separate bedroom and living area, as well as a private bathroom. Some suites also include a kitchenette or dining area.

Check Availability Previous Next Large $299 /night State-of-the-art amenities

Royal Suite

The Royal Suite is the most luxurious suite at a hotel. It features a bedroom, a living room, a dining area, and a private bathroom. It is often decorated with luxurious furnishings and features state-of-the-art amenities.

Check Availability Previous Next Updated $369 /night Features a private patio with outdoor seating.

Garden Suite

Aa luxurious and spacious accommodation option for hotel guests. This suite is designed with a garden theme, and features a private patio with outdoor seating. The suite also includes a king-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed, a dining area, and a fully equipped kitchen.

Check Availability Previous Next Large $299 /night King-sized bed and a private bathroom

Imperial Suite

The Imperial Suite is the most luxurious suite in the hotel. It features a king-sized bed, a sitting area, and a private bathroom. The suite also has a balcony with a view of the city.

Check Availability Previous Next Updated $499 /night King-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed

Executive Suite

A spacious and luxurious room designed for business travelers or those seeking a more upscale experience. The suite includes a bedroom with a king-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed, a dining area, and a private balcony.

Check Availability Previous Next Large $499 /night Separate bedroom, living room

Presidential Suite

The Presidential Suite is the most luxurious and expensive suite at a hotel. It typically features a separate bedroom, living room, and dining area, as well as a kitchenette and multiple bathrooms.

Check Availability

CHECK AVAILABILITY

page.post_content:
HEADER ALTERNATIVE

Our suites are the perfect place to stay for a relaxing and comfortable getaway. Each suite includes a bedroom, living room, and kitchenette.

STANDARD STYLE 2 ALTERNATIVE

Our suites are the perfect place to stay for a relaxing and comfortable getaway. Each suite includes a bedroom, living room, and kitchenette.

Previous Next Updated $399 /night Private bathroom

Ambassador Suite

The Ambassador Suite is a large and luxurious suite typically found in top-tier hotels. It often features a separate bedroom and living area, as well as a private bathroom. Some suites also include a kitchenette or dining area.

Check Availability Previous Next Large $299 /night State-of-the-art amenities

Royal Suite

The Royal Suite is the most luxurious suite at a hotel. It features a bedroom, a living room, a dining area, and a private bathroom. It is often decorated with luxurious furnishings and features state-of-the-art amenities.

Check Availability Previous Next Updated $369 /night Features a private patio with outdoor seating.

Garden Suite

Aa luxurious and spacious accommodation option for hotel guests. This suite is designed with a garden theme, and features a private patio with outdoor seating. The suite also includes a king-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed, a dining area, and a fully equipped kitchen.

Check Availability Previous Next Large $299 /night King-sized bed and a private bathroom

Imperial Suite

The Imperial Suite is the most luxurious suite in the hotel. It features a king-sized bed, a sitting area, and a private bathroom. The suite also has a balcony with a view of the city.

Check Availability Previous Next Updated $499 /night King-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed

Executive Suite

A spacious and luxurious room designed for business travelers or those seeking a more upscale experience. The suite includes a bedroom with a king-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed, a dining area, and a private balcony.

Check Availability Previous Next Large $499 /night Separate bedroom, living room

Presidential Suite

The Presidential Suite is the most luxurious and expensive suite at a hotel. It typically features a separate bedroom, living room, and dining area, as well as a kitchenette and multiple bathrooms.

Check Availability

CHECK AVAILABILITY

page.post_content:
OUR HISTORY

The history of the Hotel is a long and interesting one. The hotel was first opened in and has been a favorite among travelers and guests ever since.

The hotel was originally built by and was a popular spot for travelers and guests in the area. The hotel quickly became known for its high-quality service and its comfortable accommodations.

In 1901, the hotel was sold to new owners, who have continued to operate it as a premier hotel. The hotel has seen many changes over the years, but it has always remained a favorite among guests.

The Hotel is a favorite among travelers and guests for its comfortable accommodations and its high-quality service. The hotel has a long and interesting history, and it is sure to continue to be a popular spot among travelers and guests for years to come.

The Hotel industry can be traced back to ancient civilizations. For instance, the Babylonian king Hammurabi enacted laws regulating innkeepers and their charges in 1792 BC. In the Roman Empire, inns were called "tabernae" and they often served as meeting places for writers and artists.

The modern hotel industry began with the opening of the Hotel du Louvre in Paris in 1793. The hotel was opened by the businessman Philippe LeClerc and it had only ten rooms. During the 1800s, the number of hotels in Europe and North America increased as tourism became more popular.

Late 1800s

Hotel is built as a private home

In 1829, the first hotel in the United States opened in Baltimore. The hotel was called the Francis Scott Key Hotel and it had only six rooms. The first hotel in Las Vegas, Nevada, opened in 1905.

Early 1900s

Hotel is converted into a hotel

The history of the Hotel goes back to the late 1800s when it was originally built as a private home. It was converted into a hotel in the early 1900s and has been a popular destination for travelers ever since. $22

$15

$15

$15

$17

Garden of Eden Salad

$22

This salad is named after the Garden of Eden because it contains all of the earth's bounty. It includes mixed greens, sliced apples, dried cranberries, toasted walnuts, and Gorgonzola cheese. The dressing is a simple balsamic vinaigrette.

$22

$25

Greek Salad

page.post_content:
PACKAGE & SPECIALS

New

Girls' Night Out Package

The Girls' Night Out Package for a Hotel is a great way for a group of women to have a fun night out. The package includes a room for the group, a bottle of champagne, and a $100 credit for the hotel's spa. The group can use the credit to enjoy a relaxing massage or a pedicure. The package also includes a breakfast buffet for the group in the morning. This is a great way for the group to relax and catch up with each other.

From 100$ per person Learn More

Romantic Getaway Package

The Romantic Getaway Package is a perfect way to celebrate a special occasion or simply reconnect with your loved one. The package includes a one-night stay in a luxurious suite, a bottle of champagne, breakfast in bed, and a romantic dinner for two. This package is the perfect way to escape for a weekend and enjoy some quality time together.

From 199$ per person Learn More

Adventure Package - Save 50%

Includes a one night stay in a luxurious room, a $100 credit towards activities such as skiing, rafting, and golfing, and a bottle of champagne.

Learn More

MORE PACKAGES

Welcome to our packages page! Here, you'll find our latest deals and offers on accommodations and services. We update our packages frequently, so be sure to check back often for the latest deals.

20% off From $499 Includes $100 credit

Spa Package

Includes a one night stay in a luxurious room, a $100 credit towards spa services, and a bottle of champagne.

Learn More Save $50 From $150 Includes a one night stay

Getaway Package

Includes a one night stay in a luxurious room, a bouquet of flowers, and a bottle of champagne. A great deal.

Learn More 50% off From $125 Enjoy drinks and food,

Girls' Night Out

Includes a one night stay in a luxurious room, a $100 credit towards drinks and a bottle of champagne.

Learn More

A PERFECT HOLIDAY

Here, you will find everything you need to make your stay perfect.

Play games

Do Yoga

Here is the classic lorem ipsum passage followed by Boparai's odd, yet version

Relax

Here is the classic lorem ipsum passage followed by Boparai's odd, yet version

Be here now

Here is the classic lorem ipsum passage followed by Boparai's odd, yet version

Happy
Birthday Too You

Happy birthday, hotel! We hope you have a fantastic day! Included in your package are, a complimentary room upgrade, a complimentary breakfast buffet and a $50 credit to use at the hotel's restaurant or bar!

Read More

Relax &
Wellness

The Relax and Wellness package for a hotel website is a four-night package that includes a two-hour massage, a one-hour facial, and a one-hour body wrap. It is designed to help guests relax and rejuvenate their minds and bodies.

Read More

page.post_content:
ABOUT US

Welcome to our hotel! Our mission is to provide guests with an unforgettable experience by offering excellent customer service and top-of-the-line amenities. We are proud to offer a wide variety of room types and sizes to accommodate guests of all ages and lifestyles. Whether you're traveling for business or pleasure, we're sure to have the perfect room for you.

Our hotel features a variety of on-site amenities, including a heated pool and spa, a fitness center, and a business center. We also offer a variety of dining and entertainment options, including a full-service restaurant and bar, a coffee shop, and a 24-hour convenience store.

We invite you to experience all that our hotel has to offer. We look forward to welcoming you soon!

OUR HOTEL

Our elegant hotel features spacious rooms with elegant décor, and all the amenities you need to feel at home. Enjoy a delicious meal in our elegant restaurant, or relax in our luxurious spa. Our hotel is the perfect choice for business or leisure travelers alike. We look forward to welcoming you soon!

Previous Next

The Art of Hospitality

https://www.youtube.com/embed/EngW7tLk6R8

OUR TEAM

The hotel team is responsible for providing customer service and ensuring that all guests have a pleasant stay. The team includes front desk staff, housekeepers, and maintenance staff.

Zain Calzoni

Front desk

Dulce Bergson

Food service

Brandon Siphron

Housekeeping

Dulce Aminoff

Concierge

REVIEWS

We use a third-party review aggregator, TripAdvisor, to collect and display hotel reviews.

The hotel was amazing! The room was perfect and very clean. The staff was so nice and helpful. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone and would stay here again in a heartbeat! Marii Brown The staff is friendly and helpful, and the rooms are clean and comfortable. The hotel is within walking distance of many restaurants and shops, and it's close to everything. I will be returning. Marii Brown I stayed for a business trip and it was a great experience. The room was clean and comfortable and the staff was friendly and helpful. I would definitely recommend this hotel to others. Marii Brown

Get In Touch

Give Us A Call

(222) 333 4444

Send Us An Email

askus@yourhotel.com

Drop By And Talk

We invite you to experience all that our hotel has to offer. We look forward to welcoming you soon!

Contact Us

page.post_content:
The most luxurious hotel in town.

Our luxurious accommodations and impeccable service are sure to make your stay unforgettable. Our elegant hotel features spacious rooms with elegant décor, and all the amenities you need to feel at home. We look forward to welcoming you soon!

Book your stay

Elegant décor

Whether you are staying for business or pleasure, our hotel provides an oasis from the everyday. From the moment you walk in the door, you will feel pampered.

Impeccable service

Our restaurants offer cuisine of the highest standard: Russian, European, barbecue menus and culinary delights with a touch of exotic from our chef.

Rejuvenating spa

The hotel spa is a luxurious place to relax and rejuvenate. The spa offers a variety of services such as massages, facials, and body treatments.

Event venues

The hotel event venue is the perfect place to host your next event. With a variety of spaces to choose from, we can accommodate events of all sizes.

OUR HOTEL

Our elegant hotel features spacious rooms with elegant décor, and all the amenities you need to feel at home. Enjoy a delicious meal in our elegant restaurant, or relax in our luxurious spa. Our hotel is the perfect choice for business or leisure travelers alike. We look forward to welcoming you soon!

Read More Previous Next

An unforgettable stay!

Watch the video

Book your stay at our hotel and enjoy a comfortable and relaxing experience. Our hotel offers excellent accommodations and services, perfect for business and leisure travelers alike. Our convenient location allows easy access to all the best the city has to offer. Book now and take advantage of our special deals and discounts.

Hotel staff are typically knowledgeable about the area and can provide recommendations for things to do and see. Additionally, many hotels offer loyalty programs which provide discounts and other benefits.

ROOMS & SUITES


Our suites are the perfect place to stay for a relaxing and comfortable getaway. Each suite includes a bedroom, living room, and kitchenette, as well as a private balcony or patio. You'll have plenty of space to spread out and enjoy your stay. Plus, our suites come equipped with all the amenities

Previous Next Updated $399 /night Private bathroom

Ambassador Suite

The Ambassador Suite is a large and luxurious suite typically found in top-tier hotels. It often features a separate bedroom and living area, as well as a private bathroom. Some suites also include a kitchenette or dining area.

Check Availability Previous Next Large $299 /night State-of-the-art amenities

Royal Suite

The Royal Suite is the most luxurious suite at a hotel. It features a bedroom, a living room, a dining area, and a private bathroom. It is often decorated with luxurious furnishings and features state-of-the-art amenities.

Check Availability Previous Next Large $499 /night Separate bedroom, living room

Presidential Suite

The Presidential Suite is the most luxurious and expensive suite at a hotel. It typically features a separate bedroom, living room, and dining area, as well as a kitchenette and multiple bathrooms.

Check Availability

COVID-19 Precautions

We would like to advise our guests that we are closely monitoring the COVID-19 situation and will take all necessary precautions to protect our guests and staff.

Read More

Basic Hotel Etiquette

There are some rules that guests should follow in order to make their stay more pleasant for everyone. Guests should be aware of the following.

Romance Package

This package is designed for couples who want to enjoy a romantic weekend getaway at a hotel.

AT YOUR SERVICE

The staff is friendly and knowledgeable and can help you choose the right service. Our hotel offers excellent accommodations and services, perfect for business and leisure travelers alike. Our convenient location allows easy access to all the best the city has to offer. Book now and take advantage of our special deals and discounts.

Wake-up call

Beachfront

Online booking

Many locations

Best rated

Shuttle service

18 Hold golf

Tour packages

Excellence

Fast wifi

What's nearby?

There are plenty of things to do near the hotel. Depending on your location, guests might be able to visit local tourist attractions, go shopping, or go out for dinner and drinks.

Sightseeing

Visit the Statue of Liberty, Ride the Staten Island Ferry.

Dinning out

There are endless options for dining out in NYC.

Wildlife attraction

A wildlife attraction is a great place to learn about and see animals in their natural habitats. They can be educational and fun for the whole family.

Casino

They offer a variety of games and opportunities to win money, while also providing a fun and festive atmosphere.

Review

We use a third-party review aggregator, TripAdvisor, to collect and display hotel reviews. 

The hotel was amazing! The room was perfect and very clean. The staff was so nice and helpful. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone and would stay here again in a heartbeat! Marii Brown The staff is friendly and helpful, and the rooms are clean and comfortable. The hotel is within walking distance of many restaurants and shops, and it's close to everything. I will be returning. Marii Brown I stayed for a business trip and it was a great experience. The room was clean and comfortable and the staff was friendly and helpful. I would definitely recommend this hotel to others. Marii Brown

#Instagram

We are on Instagram! Follow us to see updates from our hotel, as well as photos and videos of our guests and staff having fun!

<!-- wp:shortcode -->[woocommerce_checkout]<!-- /wp:shortcode -->
<!-- wp:shortcode -->[woocommerce_my_account]<!-- /wp:shortcode -->

This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

mphb_room_type.post_content:
Imperial Suite

$299/night MORE INFO En Suite Wifi Kitchen

A view of the city

The Imperial Suite is the most luxurious suite in the hotel. It features a king-sized bed, a sitting area, and a private bathroom. The suite also has a balcony with a view of the city.

Reserve this room Previous Next

VIDEO TOUR

amenities

Spacious and luxurious

A spacious and luxurious room designed for business travelers or those seeking a more upscale experience.

9 Guests

The suite also has a private balcony, a desk, and a telephone.

A king-sized bed

The suite includes a bedroom with a king-sized bed

Kitchenette with a refrigerator

The suite also has a kitchenette with a refrigerator and a microwave, as well as a coffeemaker and a toaster

Private balcony

A sofa bed, a dining area, and a private balcony

Laptop-friendly workspace

Comes with all the amenities you would expect

READY TO BOOK?

Enquiry Form
Get a discount - 10%

VIDEO TOUR

[video_play src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/192676007" width="1024" size="icon-large" style="icon-light" icon="fa fa-play-circle-o"]

rates

High Season $499 / night

May 15th to October 15th

Check Availability Medium Season $399 / night

October 15th to January 15th

Check Availability Low Season $299 / night

January 15th to May 15th

Check Availability

YOUR RESERVATION

Special travel plans? Book your stay

YOU MIGHT ALSO LIKE

The room upgrade for a hotel would include a large flat screen TV, a comfortable couch, a mini fridge, and a Keurig coffee maker.

Previous Next Updated $399 /night Private bathroom

Ambassador Suite

The Ambassador Suite is a large and luxurious suite typically found in top-tier hotels. It often features a separate bedroom and living area, as well as a private bathroom. Some suites also include a kitchenette or dining area.

Check Availability Previous Next Updated $499 /night King-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed

Executive Suite

A spacious and luxurious room designed for business travelers or those seeking a more upscale experience. The suite includes a bedroom with a king-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed, a dining area, and a private balcony.

Check Availability Previous Next Large $499 /night Separate bedroom, living room

Presidential Suite

The Presidential Suite is the most luxurious and expensive suite at a hotel. It typically features a separate bedroom, living room, and dining area, as well as a kitchenette and multiple bathrooms.

Check Availability

mphb_room_type.post_content:
Imperial Suite

$299/night MORE INFO En Suite Wifi Kitchen

A view of the city

The Imperial Suite is the most luxurious suite in the hotel. It features a king-sized bed, a sitting area, and a private bathroom. The suite also has a balcony with a view of the city.

Reserve this room Previous Next

VIDEO TOUR

amenities

Spacious and luxurious

A spacious and luxurious room designed for business travelers or those seeking a more upscale experience.

9 Guests

The suite also has a private balcony, a desk, and a telephone.

A king-sized bed

The suite includes a bedroom with a king-sized bed

Kitchenette with a refrigerator

The suite also has a kitchenette with a refrigerator and a microwave, as well as a coffeemaker and a toaster

Private balcony

A sofa bed, a dining area, and a private balcony

Laptop-friendly workspace

Comes with all the amenities you would expect

YOUR RESERVATION

Get a discount - 10%

VIDEO TOUR

[video_play src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/192676007" width="1024" size="icon-large" style="icon-light" icon="fa fa-play-circle-o"]

rates

High Season $499 / night

May 15th to October 15th

Check Availability Medium Season $399 / night

October 15th to January 15th

Check Availability Low Season $299 / night

January 15th to May 15th

Check Availability

YOUR RESERVATION

Special travel plans? Book your stay

YOU MIGHT ALSO LIKE

The room upgrade for a hotel would include a large flat screen TV, a comfortable couch, a mini fridge, and a Keurig coffee maker.

Previous Next Updated $399 /night Private bathroom

Ambassador Suite

The Ambassador Suite is a large and luxurious suite typically found in top-tier hotels. It often features a separate bedroom and living area, as well as a private bathroom. Some suites also include a kitchenette or dining area.

Check Availability Previous Next Updated $499 /night King-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed

Executive Suite

A spacious and luxurious room designed for business travelers or those seeking a more upscale experience. The suite includes a bedroom with a king-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed, a dining area, and a private balcony.

Check Availability Previous Next Large $499 /night Separate bedroom, living room

Presidential Suite

The Presidential Suite is the most luxurious and expensive suite at a hotel. It typically features a separate bedroom, living room, and dining area, as well as a kitchenette and multiple bathrooms.

Check Availability

mphb_room_type.post_content:
Previous Next

Executive Suite

A spacious and luxurious room designed for business travelers or those seeking a more upscale experience. The suite includes a bedroom with a king-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed, a dining area, and a private balcony. The suite also has a private balcony, a desk, and a telephone. A large and luxurious suite typically found in top-tier hotels. A luxurious suite designed for business executives. It features a spacious living area, a comfortable bedroom, and a well-equipped kitchen. The living area has a comfortable sofa, a coffee table, and a flat-screen TV. The bedroom has a king-size bed, a dresser, and a flat-screen TV. The kitchen has a refrigerator, a stove, a microwave, and a dishwasher.

amenities

Spacious and luxurious A spacious and luxurious room designed for business travelers or those seeking a more upscale experience. 9 Guests The suite also has a private balcony, a desk, and a telephone. A king-sized bed The suite includes a bedroom with a king-sized bed Kitchenette with a refrigerator The suite also has a kitchenette with a refrigerator and a microwave, as well as a coffeemaker and a toaster Private balcony A sofa bed, a dining area, and a private balcony Laptop-friendly workspace Comes with all the amenities you would expect

rates

High Season $499 / night May 15th to October 15th Check Availability Medium Season $399 / night October 15th to January 15th Check Availability Low Season $299 / night January 15th to May 15th Check Availability

YOUR RESERVATION

Special travel plans? Book your stay

mphb_room_type.post_content:
Imperial Suite

$299/night MORE INFO En Suite Wifi Kitchen

A view of the city

The Imperial Suite is the most luxurious suite in the hotel. It features a king-sized bed, a sitting area, and a private bathroom. The suite also has a balcony with a view of the city.

Reserve this room Previous Next

VIDEO TOUR

[video_play src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/192676007" width="1024" size="icon-large" style="icon-light" icon="fa fa-play-circle-o"]

amenities

Spacious and luxurious

A spacious and luxurious room designed for business travelers or those seeking a more upscale experience.

9 Guests

The suite also has a private balcony, a desk, and a telephone.

A king-sized bed

The suite includes a bedroom with a king-sized bed

Kitchenette with a refrigerator

The suite also has a kitchenette with a refrigerator and a microwave, as well as a coffeemaker and a toaster

Private balcony

A sofa bed, a dining area, and a private balcony

Laptop-friendly workspace

Comes with all the amenities you would expect

rates

High Season $499 / night

May 15th to October 15th

Check Availability Medium Season $399 / night

October 15th to January 15th

Check Availability Low Season $299 / night

January 15th to May 15th

Check Availability

YOUR RESERVATION

Special travel plans? Book your stay

mphb_room_type.post_content:
Terrace with a view

book your stay today!

great place to meet friends

Aa luxurious and spacious accommodation option for hotel guests. This suite is designed with a garden theme, and features a private patio with outdoor seating. The suite also includes a king-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed, a dining area, and a fully equipped kitchen.

Reserve apartment

SERVICES

Top-notch service, and prime location are what come to mind when thinking of a hotel. Whether you are staying for business or pleasure, a hotel should provide an oasis from the everyday.

RATES

Peak

$355/night Sun – Thu $345/night Fri – Sat $2100/week

Off-peak

$345/night Sun – Thu $335/night Fri – Sat $2000/week

gallery

YOUR RESERVATION

The suite also includes a king-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed, a dining area, and a fully equipped kitchen.

mphb_room_type.post_content:
bright and beautiful

Book your stay with us today

Welcome

Phasellus sit amet enim feugiat, dignissim sem et, tempus sapien. Mauris leo. Etiam cursus sapien quis ligula rhoncus, quis.

Spacious and luxurious

A spacious and luxurious room designed for business travelers.

9 Guests

The suite also has a private balcony, a desk, and a telephone.

A king-sized bed

The suite includes a bedroom with a king-sized bed

Kitchenette with a refrigerator

The suite also has a kitchenette with a refrigerator and a microwave

Private balcony

A sofa bed, a dining area, and a private balcony

Laptop-friendly workspace

Comes with all the amenities you would expect

Video tour

take a peek inside and see why hundreds return every year.

[video_play src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/192676007" width="1024" size="icon-large" style="icon-light" icon="fa fa-play-circle-o"]

amenities

Spacious and luxurious 9 Guests A king-sized bed Kitchenette with a refrigerator Private balcony Laptop-friendly workspace When are you planning to arrive? Book your stay

rates

High Season $499 / night

May 15th to October 15th

Check Availability Medium Season $399 / night

October 15th to January 15th

Check Availability Low Season $299 / night

January 15th to May 15th

Check Availability

YOUR RESERVATION

house rules

Fusce non nibh eu nulla tincidunt cursus. Class aptent taciti sociosqu ad litora torquent per conubia nostra, per inceptos himenaeos. Integer vel elementum ipsum, quis eleifend est. In hac habitasse platea dictumst. Pellentesque rhoncus efficitur neque. Nam interdum gravida ante, in lacinia ligula sollicitudin ut. Quisque sed arcu sed nulla molestie aliquet sit amet at nibh. Nunc sodales neque id elit tincidunt ullamcorper. Cras sagittis tincidunt erat a aliquam. Integer vel enim lacus.

mphb_room_type.post_excerpt: The Royal Suite is the most luxurious suite at a hotel. It features a bedroom, a living room, a dining area, and a private bathroom. It is often decorated with luxurious furnishings and features state-of-the-art amenities.

mphb_room_type.post_content:
Popular  5/5

Ambassador Suite

From: $495 / night

Spacious and luxurious A king-sized bed Private balcony 9 Guests

About

The Ambassador Suite is a large and luxurious suite typically found in top-tier hotels. It often features a separate bedroom and living area, as well as a private bathroom. Some suites also include a kitchenette or dining area.

It features a separate bedroom and living area, as well as a private balcony with stunning views of the city. The suite also includes a marble bathroom with a Jacuzzi tub, and a fully-equipped kitchen.

Spacious Stunning views Jacuzzi tub A king-sized bed Kitchenette

Laptop-friendly workspace 9 Guests Private balcony Fully-equipped kitchen

Apartments Rates

Book your stay at our hotel and enjoy a comfortable and relaxing experience. Our hotel offers excellent accommodations and services, perfect for business and leisure travelers alike.

High Season $499 / night

May 15th to October 15th

Check Availability Medium Season $399 / night

October 15th to January 15th

Check Availability Low Season $299 / night

January 15th to May 15th

Check Availability

Review

We use a third-party review aggregator, TripAdvisor, to collect and display hotel reviews.

The hotel was amazing! The room was perfect and very clean. The staff was so nice and helpful. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone and would stay here again in a heartbeat! Marii Brown The staff is friendly and helpful, and the rooms are clean and comfortable. The hotel is within walking distance of many restaurants and shops, and it's close to everything. I will be returning. Marii Brown I stayed for a business trip and it was a great experience. The room was clean and comfortable and the staff was friendly and helpful. I would definitely recommend this hotel to others. Marii Brown

House Rules

  • Guests must provide a valid form of identification at check-in. 
  • Guests must be at least 18 years of age to check in.
  • Guests are not allowed to bring firearms into the hotel.
  • Guests are not allowed to bring pets into the hotel.
  • Guests are not allowed to smoke in the hotel.
  • Guests are responsible for their own belongings. The hotel is not responsible for any lost or stolen items.
  • Guests are responsible for any damages they cause to the hotel property.
  • Guests are responsible for any fines or penalties that are incurred during their stay.
  • The hotel reserves the right to refuse service to any guest.

YOU MIGHT ALSO LIKE

The room upgrade for a hotel would include a large flat screen TV, a comfortable couch, a mini fridge, and a Keurig coffee maker.

Previous Next Updated $399 /night Private bathroom

Ambassador Suite

The Ambassador Suite is a large and luxurious suite typically found in top-tier hotels. It often features a separate bedroom and living area, as well as a private bathroom. Some suites also include a kitchenette or dining area.

Check Availability Previous Next Updated $499 /night King-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed

Executive Suite

A spacious and luxurious room designed for business travelers or those seeking a more upscale experience. The suite includes a bedroom with a king-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed, a dining area, and a private balcony.

Check Availability Previous Next Large $499 /night Separate bedroom, living room

Presidential Suite

The Presidential Suite is the most luxurious and expensive suite at a hotel. It typically features a separate bedroom, living room, and dining area, as well as a kitchenette and multiple bathrooms.

Check Availability

mphb_room_type.post_content:
Previous Next Popular  5/5

Presidential Suite

On the other hand, we denounce with righteous indignation and dislike men who are so beguiled and demoralized by the charms of pleasure of the moment, so blinded by desire, that they cannot foresee the pain and trouble that are bound to ensue; and equal blame belongs to those who fail in their duty through weakness of will, which is the same as saying. In a free hour, when our power of choice is untrammeled and when nothing prevents our being able to do what we like best, every pleasure is to be welcomed and every pain avoided. But in certain circumstances and owing to the claims of duty or the obligations of business it will.

Amenities

Spacious Stunning views Jacuzzi tub A king-sized bed Kitchenette

Laptop-friendly workspace 9 Guests Private balcony Fully-equipped kitchen

Price

1-3 Days 100$ 4-7 Days 90$ 8+ Days 80$

Availability

Reviews

The staff is friendly and helpful, and the rooms are clean and comfortable. The hotel is within walking distance of many restaurants and shops, and it's close to everything. I will be returning. Marii Brown I stayed for a business trip and it was a great experience. The room was clean and comfortable and the staff was friendly and helpful. I would definitely recommend this hotel to others. Marii Brown

YOUR RESERVATION

Get a discount - 10%

YOU MIGHT ALSO LIKE

The room upgrade for a hotel would include a large flat screen TV, a comfortable couch, a mini fridge, and a Keurig coffee maker.

Previous Next Updated $399 /night Private bathroom

Ambassador Suite

The Ambassador Suite is a large and luxurious suite typically found in top-tier hotels. It often features a separate bedroom and living area, as well as a private bathroom. Some suites also include a kitchenette or dining area.

Check Availability Previous Next Updated $499 /night King-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed

Executive Suite

A spacious and luxurious room designed for business travelers or those seeking a more upscale experience. The suite includes a bedroom with a king-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed, a dining area, and a private balcony.

Check Availability Previous Next Large $499 /night Separate bedroom, living room

Presidential Suite

The Presidential Suite is the most luxurious and expensive suite at a hotel. It typically features a separate bedroom, living room, and dining area, as well as a kitchenette and multiple bathrooms.

Check Availability
mphb_room_type.post_excerpt: The Presidential Suite is the most luxurious and expensive suite at a hotel. It typically features a separate bedroom, living room, and dining area, as well as a kitchenette and multiple bathrooms.

The most luxurious hotel in town.

Our luxurious accommodations and impeccable service are sure to make your stay unforgettable. Our elegant hotel features spacious rooms with elegant décor, and all the amenities you need to feel at home. We look forward to welcoming you soon!

elementor_library.post_content:
bright and beautiful

Book your stay with us today

Welcome

Phasellus sit amet enim feugiat, dignissim sem et, tempus sapien. Mauris leo. Etiam cursus sapien quis ligula rhoncus, quis.

Spacious and luxurious

A spacious and luxurious room designed for business travelers.

9 Guests

The suite also has a private balcony, a desk, and a telephone.

A king-sized bed

The suite includes a bedroom with a king-sized bed

Kitchenette with a refrigerator

The suite also has a kitchenette with a refrigerator and a microwave

Private balcony

A sofa bed, a dining area, and a private balcony

Laptop-friendly workspace

Comes with all the amenities you would expect

Video tour

take a peek inside and see why hundreds return every year.

In hac habitasse platea dictumst. Pellentesque rhoncus efficitur neque. Nam interdum gravida ante, in lacinia ligula sollicitudin ut. Quisque sed arcu sed nulla molestie aliquet sit amet at nibh. Nunc sodales neque id elit tincidunt ullamcorper. Cras sagittis tincidunt erat a aliquam. Integer vel enim lacus.

elementor_library.post_content:
Terrace with a view

book your stay today!

great place to meet friends

Aa luxurious and spacious accommodation option for hotel guests. This suite is designed with a garden theme, and features a private patio with outdoor seating. The suite also includes a king-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed, a dining area, and a fully equipped kitchen.

Reserve apartment

SERVICES

Top-notch service, and prime location are what come to mind when thinking of a hotel. Whether you are staying for business or pleasure, a hotel should provide an oasis from the everyday.

RATES

Peak

$355/night Sun – Thu $345/night Fri – Sat $2100/week

Off-peak

$345/night Sun – Thu $335/night Fri – Sat $2000/week

gallery

YOUR RESERVATION

elementor_library.post_content:
Previous Next

Executive Suite

A spacious and luxurious room designed for business travelers or those seeking a more upscale experience. The suite includes a bedroom with a king-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed, a dining area, and a private balcony. The suite also has a private balcony, a desk, and a telephone. A large and luxurious suite typically found in top-tier hotels.

A luxurious suite designed for business executives. It features a spacious living area, a comfortable bedroom, and a well-equipped kitchen. The living area has a comfortable sofa, a coffee table, and a flat-screen TV. The bedroom has a king-size bed, a dresser, and a flat-screen TV. The kitchen has a refrigerator, a stove, a microwave, and a dishwasher. 

amenities

Spacious and luxurious

A spacious and luxurious room designed for business travelers or those seeking a more upscale experience.

9 Guests

The suite also has a private balcony, a desk, and a telephone.

A king-sized bed

The suite includes a bedroom with a king-sized bed

Kitchenette with a refrigerator

The suite also has a kitchenette with a refrigerator and a microwave, as well as a coffeemaker and a toaster

Private balcony

A sofa bed, a dining area, and a private balcony

Laptop-friendly workspace

Comes with all the amenities you would expect

rates

High Season $499 / night

May 15th to October 15th

Check Availability Medium Season $399 / night

October 15th to January 15th

Check Availability Low Season $299 / night

January 15th to May 15th

Check Availability

YOUR RESERVATION

Special travel plans? Book your stay

elementor_library.post_content:
Previous Next Popular  5/5

Presidential Suite

On the other hand, we denounce with righteous indignation and dislike men who are so beguiled and demoralized by the charms of pleasure of the moment, so blinded by desire, that they cannot foresee the pain and trouble that are bound to ensue; and equal blame belongs to those who fail in their duty through weakness of will, which is the same as saying. In a free hour, when our power of choice is untrammeled and when nothing prevents our being able to do what we like best, every pleasure is to be welcomed and every pain avoided. But in certain circumstances and owing to the claims of duty or the obligations of business it will.

Amenities

Spacious Stunning views Jacuzzi tub A king-sized bed Kitchenette

Laptop-friendly workspace 9 Guests Private balcony Fully-equipped kitchen

Price

1-3 Days 100$ 4-7 Days 90$ 8+ Days 80$

Availability

Reviews

The staff is friendly and helpful, and the rooms are clean and comfortable. The hotel is within walking distance of many restaurants and shops, and it's close to everything. I will be returning. Marii Brown I stayed for a business trip and it was a great experience. The room was clean and comfortable and the staff was friendly and helpful. I would definitely recommend this hotel to others. Marii Brown

YOUR RESERVATION

Get a discount - 10%

YOU MIGHT ALSO LIKE

The room upgrade for a hotel would include a large flat screen TV, a comfortable couch, a mini fridge, and a Keurig coffee maker.

Previous Next Updated $399 /night Private bathroom

Ambassador Suite

The Ambassador Suite is a large and luxurious suite typically found in top-tier hotels. It often features a separate bedroom and living area, as well as a private bathroom. Some suites also include a kitchenette or dining area.

Check Availability Previous Next Updated $499 /night King-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed

Executive Suite

A spacious and luxurious room designed for business travelers or those seeking a more upscale experience. The suite includes a bedroom with a king-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed, a dining area, and a private balcony.

Check Availability Previous Next Large $499 /night Separate bedroom, living room

Presidential Suite

The Presidential Suite is the most luxurious and expensive suite at a hotel. It typically features a separate bedroom, living room, and dining area, as well as a kitchenette and multiple bathrooms.

Check Availability

elementor_library.post_content:
Popular  5/5

Ambassador Suite

From: $495 / night

Spacious and luxurious A king-sized bed Private balcony 9 Guests

About

The Ambassador Suite is a large and luxurious suite typically found in top-tier hotels. It often features a separate bedroom and living area, as well as a private bathroom. Some suites also include a kitchenette or dining area.

It features a separate bedroom and living area, as well as a private balcony with stunning views of the city. The suite also includes a marble bathroom with a Jacuzzi tub, and a fully-equipped kitchen.

Spacious Stunning views Jacuzzi tub A king-sized bed Kitchenette

Laptop-friendly workspace 9 Guests Private balcony Fully-equipped kitchen

Apartments Rates

Book your stay at our hotel and enjoy a comfortable and relaxing experience. Our hotel offers excellent accommodations and services, perfect for business and leisure travelers alike.

High Season $499 / night

May 15th to October 15th

Check Availability Medium Season $399 / night

October 15th to January 15th

Check Availability Low Season $299 / night

January 15th to May 15th

Check Availability

Review

We use a third-party review aggregator, TripAdvisor, to collect and display hotel reviews.

The hotel was amazing! The room was perfect and very clean. The staff was so nice and helpful. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone and would stay here again in a heartbeat! Marii Brown The staff is friendly and helpful, and the rooms are clean and comfortable. The hotel is within walking distance of many restaurants and shops, and it's close to everything. I will be returning. Marii Brown I stayed for a business trip and it was a great experience. The room was clean and comfortable and the staff was friendly and helpful. I would definitely recommend this hotel to others. Marii Brown

House Rules

  • Guests must provide a valid form of identification at check-in. 
  • Guests must be at least 18 years of age to check in.
  • Guests are not allowed to bring firearms into the hotel.
  • Guests are not allowed to bring pets into the hotel.
  • Guests are not allowed to smoke in the hotel.
  • Guests are responsible for their own belongings. The hotel is not responsible for any lost or stolen items.
  • Guests are responsible for any damages they cause to the hotel property.
  • Guests are responsible for any fines or penalties that are incurred during their stay.
  • The hotel reserves the right to refuse service to any guest.

YOU MIGHT ALSO LIKE

The room upgrade for a hotel would include a large flat screen TV, a comfortable couch, a mini fridge, and a Keurig coffee maker.

Previous Next Updated $399 /night Private bathroom

Ambassador Suite

The Ambassador Suite is a large and luxurious suite typically found in top-tier hotels. It often features a separate bedroom and living area, as well as a private bathroom. Some suites also include a kitchenette or dining area.

Check Availability Previous Next Updated $499 /night King-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed

Executive Suite

A spacious and luxurious room designed for business travelers or those seeking a more upscale experience. The suite includes a bedroom with a king-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed, a dining area, and a private balcony.

Check Availability Previous Next Large $499 /night Separate bedroom, living room

Presidential Suite

The Presidential Suite is the most luxurious and expensive suite at a hotel. It typically features a separate bedroom, living room, and dining area, as well as a kitchenette and multiple bathrooms.

Check Availability

elementor_library.post_content:
Imperial Suite

$299/night MORE INFO En Suite Wifi Kitchen

A view of the city

The Imperial Suite is the most luxurious suite in the hotel. It features a king-sized bed, a sitting area, and a private bathroom. The suite also has a balcony with a view of the city.

Reserve this room Previous Next

VIDEO TOUR

[video_play src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/192676007" width="1024" size="icon-large" style="icon-light" icon="fa fa-play-circle-o"]

amenities

Spacious and luxurious

A spacious and luxurious room designed for business travelers or those seeking a more upscale experience.

9 Guests

The suite also has a private balcony, a desk, and a telephone.

A king-sized bed

The suite includes a bedroom with a king-sized bed

Kitchenette with a refrigerator

The suite also has a kitchenette with a refrigerator and a microwave, as well as a coffeemaker and a toaster

Private balcony

A sofa bed, a dining area, and a private balcony

Laptop-friendly workspace

Comes with all the amenities you would expect

rates

High Season $499 / night

May 15th to October 15th

Check Availability Medium Season $399 / night

October 15th to January 15th

Check Availability Low Season $299 / night

January 15th to May 15th

Check Availability

YOUR RESERVATION

Special travel plans? Book your stay

elementor_library.post_content:
Imperial Suite

$299/night MORE INFO En Suite Wifi Kitchen

A view of the city

The Imperial Suite is the most luxurious suite in the hotel. It features a king-sized bed, a sitting area, and a private bathroom. The suite also has a balcony with a view of the city.

Reserve this room Previous Next

VIDEO TOUR

amenities

Spacious and luxurious

A spacious and luxurious room designed for business travelers or those seeking a more upscale experience.

9 Guests

The suite also has a private balcony, a desk, and a telephone.

A king-sized bed

The suite includes a bedroom with a king-sized bed

Kitchenette with a refrigerator

The suite also has a kitchenette with a refrigerator and a microwave, as well as a coffeemaker and a toaster

Private balcony

A sofa bed, a dining area, and a private balcony

Laptop-friendly workspace

Comes with all the amenities you would expect

READY TO BOOK?

Enquiry Form
Get a discount - 10%

VIDEO TOUR

[video_play src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/192676007" width="1024" size="icon-large" style="icon-light" icon="fa fa-play-circle-o"]

rates

High Season $499 / night

May 15th to October 15th

Check Availability Medium Season $399 / night

October 15th to January 15th

Check Availability Low Season $299 / night

January 15th to May 15th

Check Availability

YOUR RESERVATION

Special travel plans? Book your stay

YOU MIGHT ALSO LIKE

The room upgrade for a hotel would include a large flat screen TV, a comfortable couch, a mini fridge, and a Keurig coffee maker.

Previous Next Updated $399 /night Private bathroom

Ambassador Suite

The Ambassador Suite is a large and luxurious suite typically found in top-tier hotels. It often features a separate bedroom and living area, as well as a private bathroom. Some suites also include a kitchenette or dining area.

Check Availability Previous Next Updated $499 /night King-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed

Executive Suite

A spacious and luxurious room designed for business travelers or those seeking a more upscale experience. The suite includes a bedroom with a king-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed, a dining area, and a private balcony.

Check Availability Previous Next Large $499 /night Separate bedroom, living room

Presidential Suite

The Presidential Suite is the most luxurious and expensive suite at a hotel. It typically features a separate bedroom, living room, and dining area, as well as a kitchenette and multiple bathrooms.

Check Availability

elementor_library.post_content:
Imperial Suite

$299/night MORE INFO En Suite Wifi Kitchen

A view of the city

The Imperial Suite is the most luxurious suite in the hotel. It features a king-sized bed, a sitting area, and a private bathroom. The suite also has a balcony with a view of the city.

Reserve this room Previous Next

VIDEO TOUR

amenities

Spacious and luxurious

A spacious and luxurious room designed for business travelers or those seeking a more upscale experience.

9 Guests

The suite also has a private balcony, a desk, and a telephone.

A king-sized bed

The suite includes a bedroom with a king-sized bed

Kitchenette with a refrigerator

The suite also has a kitchenette with a refrigerator and a microwave, as well as a coffeemaker and a toaster

Private balcony

A sofa bed, a dining area, and a private balcony

Laptop-friendly workspace

Comes with all the amenities you would expect

YOUR RESERVATION

Get a discount - 10%

VIDEO TOUR

[video_play src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/192676007" width="1024" size="icon-large" style="icon-light" icon="fa fa-play-circle-o"]

rates

High Season $499 / night

May 15th to October 15th

Check Availability Medium Season $399 / night

October 15th to January 15th

Check Availability Low Season $299 / night

January 15th to May 15th

Check Availability

YOUR RESERVATION

Special travel plans? Book your stay

YOU MIGHT ALSO LIKE

The room upgrade for a hotel would include a large flat screen TV, a comfortable couch, a mini fridge, and a Keurig coffee maker.

Previous Next Updated $399 /night Private bathroom

Ambassador Suite

The Ambassador Suite is a large and luxurious suite typically found in top-tier hotels. It often features a separate bedroom and living area, as well as a private bathroom. Some suites also include a kitchenette or dining area.

Check Availability Previous Next Updated $499 /night King-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed

Executive Suite

A spacious and luxurious room designed for business travelers or those seeking a more upscale experience. The suite includes a bedroom with a king-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed, a dining area, and a private balcony.

Check Availability Previous Next Large $499 /night Separate bedroom, living room

Presidential Suite

The Presidential Suite is the most luxurious and expensive suite at a hotel. It typically features a separate bedroom, living room, and dining area, as well as a kitchenette and multiple bathrooms.

Check Availability

elementor_library.post_content:
2 Column

Our suites are the perfect place to stay for a relaxing and comfortable getaway.

STANDARD STYLE 2 ALTERNATIVE

Our suites are the perfect place to stay for a relaxing and comfortable getaway.

Previous Next Large $499 /night Separate bedroom, living room

Standard – Sidebar Book

The Presidential Suite is the most luxurious and expensive suite at a hotel. It typically features a separate bedroom, living room, and dining area, as well as a kitchenette and multiple bathrooms.

Check Availability Previous Next Updated $399 /night Private bathroom

Ambassador Suite

The Ambassador Suite is a large and luxurious suite typically found in top-tier hotels. It often features a separate bedroom and living area, as well as a private bathroom. Some suites also include a kitchenette or dining area.

Check Availability Previous Next Large $299 /night State-of-the-art amenities

Royal Suite

The Royal Suite is the most luxurious suite at a hotel. It features a bedroom, a living room, a dining area, and a private bathroom. It is often decorated with luxurious furnishings and features state-of-the-art amenities.

Check Availability Previous Next Updated $369 /night Features a private patio with outdoor seating.

Garden Suite

Aa luxurious and spacious accommodation option for hotel guests. This suite is designed with a garden theme, and features a private patio with outdoor seating. The suite also includes a king-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed, a dining area, and a fully equipped kitchen.

Check Availability Previous Next Large $299 /night King-sized bed and a private bathroom

Imperial Suite

The Imperial Suite is the most luxurious suite in the hotel. It features a king-sized bed, a sitting area, and a private bathroom. The suite also has a balcony with a view of the city.

Check Availability Previous Next Updated $499 /night King-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed

Executive Suite

A spacious and luxurious room designed for business travelers or those seeking a more upscale experience. The suite includes a bedroom with a king-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed, a dining area, and a private balcony.

Check Availability Previous Next Large $499 /night Separate bedroom, living room

Standard – Sidebar Form

The Presidential Suite is the most luxurious and expensive suite at a hotel. It typically features a separate bedroom, living room, and dining area, as well as a kitchenette and multiple bathrooms.

HEADER ALTERNATIVE

Our suites are the perfect place to stay for a relaxing and comfortable getaway. Each suite includes a bedroom, living room, and kitchenette.

STANDARD STYLE 2 ALTERNATIVE

Our suites are the perfect place to stay for a relaxing and comfortable getaway. Each suite includes a bedroom, living room, and kitchenette.

Previous Next Large $499 /night Separate bedroom, living room

Standard – Sidebar Book

The Presidential Suite is the most luxurious and expensive suite at a hotel. It typically features a separate bedroom, living room, and dining area, as well as a kitchenette and multiple bathrooms.

Check Availability Previous Next Updated $399 /night Private bathroom

Ambassador Suite

The Ambassador Suite is a large and luxurious suite typically found in top-tier hotels. It often features a separate bedroom and living area, as well as a private bathroom. Some suites also include a kitchenette or dining area.

Check Availability Previous Next Large $299 /night State-of-the-art amenities

Royal Suite

The Royal Suite is the most luxurious suite at a hotel. It features a bedroom, a living room, a dining area, and a private bathroom. It is often decorated with luxurious furnishings and features state-of-the-art amenities.

Check Availability Previous Next Updated $369 /night Features a private patio with outdoor seating.

Garden Suite

Aa luxurious and spacious accommodation option for hotel guests. This suite is designed with a garden theme, and features a private patio with outdoor seating. The suite also includes a king-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed, a dining area, and a fully equipped kitchen.

Check Availability Previous Next Large $299 /night King-sized bed and a private bathroom

Imperial Suite

The Imperial Suite is the most luxurious suite in the hotel. It features a king-sized bed, a sitting area, and a private bathroom. The suite also has a balcony with a view of the city.

Check Availability Previous Next Updated $499 /night King-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed

Executive Suite

A spacious and luxurious room designed for business travelers or those seeking a more upscale experience. The suite includes a bedroom with a king-sized bed, a living area with a sofa bed, a dining area, and a private balcony.

Check Availability Previous Next Large $499 /night Separate bedroom, living room

About Us

Our hotel is a smoke-free, pet-friendly hotel with a free hot breakfast buffet and free WiFi. We offer a variety of rooms and suites, perfect for business and leisure travelers alike. 

  • Packages
  • Rooms
  • Menu Page
  • Gallery
  • Blog
  • Contact Us
Contact Us
Facebook Twitter Instagram Book Now
  • Privacy & Policy

Copyright. All right reserved.
